title: Whenever I play rank recently the client kicks me out of the game or it freezes.

embed.description: Joey376 / Bronze 5 100LP / 8W 8L Win Ratio 50% / Syndra - 6W 2L Win Ratio 75%, Blitzcrank - 2W 2L Win Ratio 50%, Caitlyn - 0W 2L Win Ratio 0%, Shyvana - 1W 0L Win Ratio 100%, Renekton - 0W 1L Win Ratio 0%

body:
This started happening around two weeks ago it's gotten to a point where I can not even play ranked or normals in fear of DC it's not my internet or laptop either. I do not know what's going on but earlier today there was a update that I thought would fix this issue and played some Poro King to see if this was resolved and it seemed to work I go into rank and there is no sound so I try to fix the settings, then my client freezes and by the time I returned the game was remade.
Please help me to resolve these issues I am tired of being in lower priority q due to these issues I am playing currently playing on the Beta client if that helps.
I have never had a history of going AFK during ranked this has made me more salty when playing other game modes so I say things I do not mean but it's hard I have never has these issues for such a extended amount of time .
We even had first blood that game on a Draven that I had apparently gone "AFK" so there is no reason for me to leave that game since it's in a winning state.
Sorry for making this longer then it had to be and Thank You.
Oh is anyone else having these issues?

replies.body: Disconnections are commonly network related, and results from a poor connection.  I recommend going over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help fix this up.  It would be best to test it out in custom games for now to prevent any penalties.  Let me know if you have any questions!
How would I use the HexTech repair tool and how long will I be in low priority q?
It's not my internet I have 200 Mbps worth well between 200-150 , but whenever I try to use the Hextexch repair tool it says I need admin privileges so how would I achieve that?
